about_the_game:
Life Sim is a unique simulation game that gives you complete freedom to live however you choose. The game has no set goals—you define your own. Whether you want to build a successful career, manage properties, create a budget, stay fit, or anything else, Life Sim offers every essential feature you’d expect from a life simulation game.

In Life Sim, you are the center of everything. The world revolves around you. Shape your country’s economy for the better and raise the standard of living, or plunge it into chaos, leading to mass emigration and death waves. The choices are entirely yours.

You have the power to influence your country’s economy, agriculture, exports, and imports. Become the beloved king of your people, or play as the feared landowner who controls all the farmlands and is both hated and feared.

Life Sim lets you create your dream character and your dream country, putting ultimate control in your hands.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (only 64 bit), Windows 8 (only 64 bit), Windows 10 (only 64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium CPU G645T, 2,5+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7800, AMD HD 4600, Intel HD3000 or similiar
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (only 64 bit), Windows 8 (only 64 bit), Windows 10 (only 64 bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 560 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 5800 or higher
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Life Sim is a text-based life simulation where your choices shape your destiny. Manage careers, control the economy, influence politics, and make decisions that affect the world around you. An immersive experience where every choice matters.
